api_url.description: Please enter your basic URL from Gitlab instance

private_token.description: Log into your Gitlab account and then generate a personal Access Token.

groups.description: Space-delimited list of groups. e.g. airbyte.io

projects.description: Space-delimited list of projects. e.g. airbyte.io/documentation meltano/tap-gitlab

start_date.description: The date from which you'd like to replicate data for Gitlab API, in the format YYYY-MM-DDT00:00:00Z. All data generated after this date will be replicated.
